Plot: On New Year's Eve, the luxury ocean liner Poseidon capsizes after being swamped by a rogue wave. The survivors are left to fight for their lives as they attempt to escape the sinking ship.
Title: Poseidon
Actors: Josh Lucas, Kurt Russell, Jacinda Barrett, Richard Dreyfuss
tomatoConsensus: This remake of The Poseidon Adventure delivers dazzling special effects. Unfortunately, it doesn't seem that any of the budget was left over to devote to the script.
